product_description: Invigorate your senses as you rejuvenate your hands with PURELL® Hand Sanitizer Spray. Backed by a powerful formula, it’s ready to use whenever a quick refresh is needed and leaves hands feeling clean and smelling amazing. Our hand sanitizers have been trusted to kill germs and care for skin for years. Now, we’ve developed a refreshing spray that kills 99.99% of germs that may cause illness. PURELL® Hand Sanitizing Spray is 4x more effective when tested against a more expensive hand sanitizer mist. Our active ingredient is high quality, plant-based ethanol produced in the USA. A blend of essential oils provides a serene Verbena and Lavender scent. It’s free of dyes, parabens, phthalates, and sulfates. Triclosan is never an ingredient in our hand sanitizer. Put your mind at ease whenever you touch shared surfaces with convenient two-ounce bottles that are perfectly sized to fit wherever you’d like to have access to hand sanitizer. Take them on the go wherever life takes you, or keep them ready to grab in desk drawers, in your car’s center console, and in the kitchen. The small size is airport and TSA-friendly. Case includes: 6 – PURELL® Hand Sanitizer Spray, Lavender and Verbena scent, 2 fl oz Spray Bottles. GOJO, makers of the PURELL® brand, is proud to be certified as a Women's Business Enterprise by the Women's Business Enterprise National Council.
